title: Get all the project and user associed
name: GetAdminProjects

title: Accept offer
name: AcceptOffer
description: The project's owen accept the offer. Turn project's state to running. Return the offer.

title: Create a offer
name: CreateOffer
description: Create a new offer - investor will be linked by is token. By default, offer state is "waiting" for an action from the project's owner. If the owner accept, will be set to "accepted", if he refuse will be set to "refused". Turn the project's state to waiting (for acceptation by the project's owner). Return the offer, the investor and the project.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
  {
      "user": {
         "id": "a04d7e98-09f5-4890-bc4d-a89a799c3d65",

      },
      "project": {

}

title: Refuse offer
name: RefuseOffer
description: Project's owner can refuse the offer. Turn back the projet's state to valid to receive an another offer. Return the offer.

title: Create project
name: CreateProject
description: Create a new project. By default, project state is set to "valid". Will be change to "unvalid" and requiere manuel admin validation. When a investor make an offer, the project state turn to "waiting" -- mean an action from ower. He can accept the offer, turn the project to "running" (refounding) or refuse, project will turn back to valid for now. When the last refound is made, the project state will be set to "complete". For now, no need to send interests rate, will be set to 0.01 by default.

Parameter.description: Mandatory Number of month choose for the refund process duration.
